title: PS5 Demo Footage Surfaces - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.20.19
description:
Get your first refill pack free at http://getquip.com/games

Get 15% off your first order at http://thirdlove.com/games

Andrea and Fran discuss the first true cross-play launch, George R.
R. Martin is rumored to be consulting with Dark Souls devs, PS5 demo footage surfaces, and God of War has crossed 10 million in sales.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:17 - Housekeeping
Greg and Tim are in Florida this week for Full Sail Hall of Fame! See them at their on-campus Meet and Greet Wednesday at 1 PM in the Building 3 EB Lobby. Then, catch them at their open-to-the-public meet and greet Wednesday at 7pm ET at Deadly Sins Brewing!
The Roper Report   -
00:05:52 - Dauntless Launches Today With True Cross-Play
00:12:15 - George R.R. Martin reignites rumors about game with Dark Souls creator
00:18:06 - PlayStation 5 tech demo footage surfaces at investor conference
00:34:37 - God of War Sales Have Passed 10 Million
00:40:06 - Call Of Duty Mobile Beta Rolling Out In Select Regions
00:42:08 - Sony Working on Twisted Metal TV Show
00:44:19 -  Ads
00:47:28 - Out today
00:53:39 - “Remember when Sony Rewards gave you rewards point for your trophies, and you could use those points on PSN credit, PS+ memberships, & other Sony products?” - Emmet Watkins Jr.
Reader mail   -
00:55:09 - “Do you guys think Oculus Quest will succeed or is the VR headset market too full?” - GameJumperX
01:00:38 - Squad Up: Rickeshey - PS4 or Xbox One - Rickeshey
01:01:43 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Andrea & Whitta
